title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 3rd, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with former Sacramento business owner Elizabeth Novak about why she decided to leave after conditions in California's capital started to deteriorate.

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with WMMB's Bill Mick and WTKF's Ben Ball about how local residents are dealing with Hurricane Dorian as it moves up the East Coast.

Todd speaks with Fox News contributor Rachel Campos-Duffy about her new book "Paloma Wants To Be Lady Freedom."

Todd speaks with Alan Dershowitz about his new book "Defending Israel," about he and others see the United States' relationship with Israel.
